Exaggerate: The claim suggests that no one in the mainstream media covered the press conference, which may be an exaggeration since there is evidence that at least two media outlets covered it.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that no one in the mainstream media covered the press conference.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the mainstream media should have covered the press conference, without considering other factors that may have influenced their coverage decisions.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the mainstream media did cover the press conference, as evidenced by the Austin American-Statesman and the Associated Press reporting on it.
